text: The team is composed of experienced negotiators in several fields. Sir Pierson Dixon has a wide reputation as a skilful backstage negotiator since his days as Britain's chief UN delegate. Second in command is Mr. Eric Roll, 53-year-old Deputy Secretary at the Ministry of Agriculture, Food, and Fisheries. The Foreign Office is represented by Sir Roderick Barclay, who has taken part in all the detailed Common Market exchanges over the past year with the French, Germans, and Italians.
handwritten_text: The team is composed of experienced negotiators in several fields. Sir Pierson Dixon has a wide reputation as a skilful backstage negotiator since his days as Britain's chief UN delegate. Second in command is Mr. Eric Roll, 53-year-old Deputy Secretary at the Ministry of Agriculture, Food, and Fisheries. The Foreign Office is represented by Sir Roderick Barclay, who has taken part in all the detailed Common Market exchanges over the past year with the French, Germans, and Italians.
